technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned that her travel plan was cancelled due to the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in the conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and tried to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The importance of vaccines was not discussed at all.
booster_importance: The importance of boosters was not discussed at all.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a low amount of cognitive complexity during the conversation.
general_notes: The participant was a high school student during the pandemic.
